data.fullContent: The teacher gives a broad overview of the origin, the organization, and the tenets of the world's major religions (Buddhism, Christianity, Hinduism, Islam, and Judaism). Information includes common symbols and representative music of each religion. Teacher checks for understanding during the instruction by using a student response system. Students take notes and respond to questions using their clickers (student response devices).
data.answer: 本课程主要介绍世界主要宗教(佛教、基督教、印度教、伊斯兰教和犹太教)的起源、组织和教义。信息包括每个宗教的共同符号和代表性音乐。教师在教学过程中使用学生反应系统来检查学生的理解能力。学生们用点击器(学生反应设备)做笔记和回答问题。
